name: BBRMS 3: The Fancy School
description:
You guys can download the open source below if you want to mod this map but make sure you follow the Gamebanana site rules even this is unofficial but it still important to follow the Gamebanana site rules if you decided to mod this map. Credits to the owner also required if you make a mod from this map. Also you need Unity 2021.1.5 to mod this map.

Open source: https://gamebanana.com/mods/138967

Credits:

mystman12 - Creator of Baldi's basic
